title: Now Playing not working consistently
content:
Hey,

I got my Pixel a few days ago and noticed that Now Playing is almost never working. In 6 days, it only detected 1 song, while at least 10 others should have been detected (most of them are pretty well-known, so probably exist in the offline database). 
Furthermore, if I try to add the History widget to my home screen, it will just bring up the popup window saying that Pixel Ambient Services keep closing. If I'm in a launcher, it will make it crash, and if in the Pixel Launcher, it'll just do nothing after I close the window.
I tried changing the notification and lock screen access for Ambient services, uninstalled and reinstalled the service, but nothing changes.

Any idea ? Thx
